text: Pajomʙaronason guftand: «Ojo dar Xudo — on ofarinandai osmonhovu zamin — sakke hast? Sumoro da'vat mekunad, to gunohonatonro ʙiʙaxsad va to muddate muajjan sumoro zinda guzorad». Guftand: «Sumo mardumone monandi mo hasted. Mexohed moro az on ci padaronamon meparastidand, ʙozdored. Baroi mo dalele ravsan ʙijovared!»
